# Preliminatries
## Importing libraries 
```{r}
library(moderndive)
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(gapminder)
```
## Importing Data
```{r}
evals_ch5 <- evals %>%
  select(ID, score, bty_avg, age)
```

## Explore the Data
```{r}
glimpse(evals_ch5)
```

## Sample the Data 
```{r}
evals_ch5 %>%
  sample_n(size = 5)
```
## Mean and Median of BTY and Score 

```{r}
evals_ch5 %>%
  summarize(mean_bty_avg = mean(bty_avg), mean_score = mean(score),
            median_bty_avg = median(bty_avg), median_score = median(score))
```
